  1. Unnamed Package
Contents
  1. Description
  2. Classes and Interfaces

Unnamed Package

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ClientHandler
    The ClientHandler class represents a thread that handles individual client connections to the HTTP server.
    ConfigLoader
    The ConfigLoader class provides functionality to load server configuration from a properties file.
    FileAccessController
    The FileAccessController class manages thread-safe file access operations for the HTTP server.
    LogConsumer
    The LogConsumer class implements asynchronous file logging using a producer-consumer pattern.
    LogEntry
    The LogEntry class represents a single log entry for HTTP requests in JSON format.
    Main
    The Main class is the entry point for the HTTP server application.
    MainHTTPServerThread
    The MainHTTPServerThread class implements the core HTTP server that listens on a specified port.
    ServerConfig
    The ServerConfig class manages configuration settings for the HTTP server.
    ThreadPool
    The threadPool class extends ThreadPoolExecutor to provide custom thread pool functionality.
